nodes.text: The Corellian Chemical Corporation, also known under the abbreviated names Corellian Che and CorChemCo, was a subsidiary of the InterGalactic Banking Clan that went bankrupt during the Clone Wars.
The company manufactured the Beastmaster Chem Lure and fire paste, a substance that could ignite almost any flammable object.

The Corellian Chemical Corperation was first mentioned as Corellian Chem on a data-screen in "An Old Friend," the fifth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season. Its full name was provided by its accompanying episode guide on StarWars.com.
